comments.body:
Just a misspelled in the comment:
> [...] in browserless **envoronment** like [..]
Is there a particular reason the minimum required version needed to be updated? I'm not sure I see it.

@uniqueiniquity Yes, `/// <reference lib="..." />` comes with [TS 3.0](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/release-notes/typescript-3-0.html). It is used in DOM test file to check whenever monkeypatch is mergable with the full DOM typings.

There is nothing that impacts types themselves.
